content.question: Which of the following represents a consequence of candidate-centered electoral campaigns?

choices.label: A decrease in the role of political parties in campaign management
A decrease in the number of third-party candidates on the ballot
A decrease in the amount of money spent on political campaigns
A decrease in voter outreach and mobilization efforts

content.answer: A decrease in the role of political parties in campaign management

topic.text: 5.4: How and Why Political Parties Change and Adapt
